entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 p.m. EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Blizzard. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
